DDL.statement: CREATE INDEX PH_SSCC_NDX ON APP_PALLET_HISTORY (SSCC, TRANSACTION_DATE)
ALTER TABLE APP_PALLET ADD DATE_CREATED DATE DEFAULT NULL
ALTER TABLE APP_PALLET ADD CREATED_BY_USER_ID VARCHAR2(20) DEFAULT NULL
ALTER TABLE APP_PALLET ADD DATE_UPDATED DATE DEFAULT NULL
ALTER TABLE APP_PALLET ADD UPDATED_BY_USER_ID VARCHAR2(20) DEFAULT NULL
UPDATE APP_PALLET SET DATE_CREATED = (SELECT MIN(TRANSACTION_DATE) FROM APP_PALLET_HISTORY WHERE SSCC = APP_PALLET.SSCC)
UPDATE APP_PALLET SET DATE_UPDATED = (SELECT MAX(TRANSACTION_DATE) FROM APP_PALLET_HISTORY WHERE SSCC = APP_PALLET.SSCC)

UPDATE APP_PALLET T1 SET CREATED_BY_USER_ID = (SELECT USER_ID FROM APP_PALLET_HISTORY T2 WHERE T2.SSCC = T1.SSCC AND TRANSACTION_REF = (SELECT MIN(TRANSACTION_REF) FROM APP_PALLET_HISTORY T2 WHERE T2.SSCC = T1.SSCC) AND ROWNUM = 1)

UPDATE APP_PALLET T1 SET UPDATED_BY_USER_ID = (SELECT USER_ID FROM APP_PALLET_HISTORY T2 WHERE T2.SSCC = T1.SSCC AND TRANSACTION_REF = (SELECT MAX(TRANSACTION_REF) FROM APP_PALLET_HISTORY T2 WHERE T2.SSCC = T1.SSCC) AND ROWNUM = 1)
